abstract: Op-Ed article by author Bob Morris describes visit to island of Tanna in South Pacific country of Vanuatu, home to John Frum movement; notes cult worships white American man Frum, who visited nation in 1930s and preached that island would receive material goods from America if it reclaimed its own traditions; observes island peoples' continuing love of America kindled patriotism within himself.
lead_paragraph: An American flag flapped on a crooked pole. I found myself saluting it, something I would never have done back in the U.S. Then I got out my ukulele.

headline.main: From the Mountains, to the Prairies, to the Ocean to Vanuatu
